events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't been updated.
The reported issue involves a delayed delivery with no recent tracking updates, indicating a potential shipping delay.
Assigning this case to the logistics support agent to investigate the delayed shipment for the customer.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet and I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and any recent tracking details you have so I can look into this?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The tracking status says 'In transit' but hasn't changed for five days.
I've contacted the shipping provider and they confirmed a delay due to unforeseen transport issues. Your package should arrive within 3 business days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you looking into this and letting me know when to expect the delivery.
The delivery delay has been explained and the estimated new arrival date provided, resolving the customer's inquiry.
Following up to confirm if you received your package as expected and if everything is in order with your order.
Yes, I got the package yesterday and everything looks great. Thanks for your help resolving the delay.
Closing the case now as the delivery was completed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
